SEARCH
Package gutek.utils

Class AlertMessageUtil

java.lang.Object
gutek.utils.AlertMessageUtil
public class AlertMessageUtil extends Object
Utility class for displaying alert dialogs in the application.

This class provides a simple interface for showing alerts with various alert types, such as warnings, informational messages, and error messages.

  • Method Details

    • showInfoAlert

      public static void showInfoAlert(String translatedMessage, TranslationService translationService, MainStage mainStage)
      Displays an informational alert dialog with translated text.
      Parameters:
      translatedMessage - the translated message to display in the alert
      translationService - the service for retrieving translations
      mainStage - the main stage of the application, used for scaling and positioning

    • showWarningAlert

    • createAlert

      private static javafx.scene.control.Alert createAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String titleKey, String headerKey, String contentText, TranslationService translationService, MainStage mainStage)
      Creates and configures an Alert dialog with a given type, title, and content.
      Parameters:
      alertType - the type of alert (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR)
      titleKey - the translation key for the alert title
      headerKey - the translation key for the alert header
      contentText - the main message content for the alert
      translationService - the service for retrieving translations
      mainStage - the main stage of the application, used for scaling and positioning
      Returns:
      a configured Alert dialog ready to be displayed

    • setDialogSizeAndPosition

      private static void setDialogSizeAndPosition(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert, MainStage mainStage)
      Sets the size and center position of the dialog based on the main stage size and scale factor.
      Parameters:
      alert - the Alert dialog to be sized and positioned
      mainStage - the main stage of the application, used for scaling and positioning

    • styleDialogText

      private static void styleDialogText(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert, double scaleFactor)
      Styles the text size for the header and content areas of the dialog.
      Parameters:
      alert - the Alert dialog whose text will be styled
      scaleFactor - the scale factor to adjust the text size

    • styleOKButton

      private static void styleOKButton(javafx.scene.control.Alert alert, String buttonText, String iconPath, double scaleFactor, String backgroundColor)
      Styles the OK button with specified text, icon, and color.
      Parameters:
      alert - the Alert dialog containing the OK button
      buttonText - the translated text for the OK button
      iconPath - the path to the icon image for the OK button
      scaleFactor - the scale factor to adjust the button's size and font
      backgroundColor - the background color for the button
